TopicTitle: will we be having stock propulsion using sustainable energy?

Articles.Content:
see...

in interstellar, we have solar sail and antimatter

in some fork of firesplitter (i forgot its name), we have a propfan using electricity (and of cos you are use solar cell to make electricity)

but hey... why dont we have these kind of cool stuff in the stock game? they open up endless opportunities...

Edited July 3, 2014 by lammatt

Electric propellers are a possibility, just like airbags for lithobraking they're on the "it would be nice to add them but not a priority ATM" list.

Solar sails would probably have to be even more ridiculously overpowered compared to real life than ion engines are to not be a pain to use.
Or if it's capable of thrusting under on-rail warp
